type.name: Condense
type.summary:
Removes non-essential records containing null values with unique consideration for this indicator.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: Time series of indicator results, condensed.

type.name: CondenseT
type.summary:
Removes non-essential records containing null or NaN values.
See documentation for more information.
type.returns: Time series of indicator results, condensed.
